title: raising hands: medium skin tone

description: This version of the  Raising Hands emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on supporte
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the raising hands emoji with a medium skin tone conveys jubilant celebration and enthusiastic agreement with its vibrant presence. The hands are depicted with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and gentle 3D shading, giving them a friendly and approachable feel. Realistic lighting subtly catches the contours, suggesting a dynamic upward motion that perfectly captures excitement or praise in digital conversations.
